faq.title: What is online doctor consultation?
faq.content: Online doctor consultation allows you to connect with a qualified medical professional through the internet. You can discuss your health concerns, receive advice, and even get prescriptions, all from the comfort of your home.

faq.title: How do I book an online consultation?
faq.content:
To book an online consultation, follow these steps:
  • Visit our website and log in to your account.
  • Choose the type of doctor or specialty you need.
  • Select a time slot that suits you.
  • Make the payment to confirm your appointment.
  • You’ll receive a link to join the consultation at the scheduled time.

faq.title: What do I need for the online consultation?
faq.content:
You’ll need:
  • A stable internet connection.
  • A device with a camera and microphone (such as a smartphone, tablet, or computer).
  • A quiet and private space for your consultation.

faq.title: Are the doctors on your platform qualified?
faq.content: Yes, all doctors on our platform are fully licensed and have been thoroughly vetted. They are qualified professionals with the appropriate certifications to practice medicine.

faq.title: Can I get a prescription through online consultation?
faq.content: Yes, after evaluating your condition, the doctor may issue an e-prescription, which will be sent directly to your account. You can use this prescription at any pharmacy or opt for our home delivery service.

faq.title: Is my information secure and private?
faq.content: Absolutely. We use advanced encryption and security protocols to protect your personal and medical information. Your consultations are confidential, and we comply with all relevant data protection regulations.

faq.title: What if I need a physical examination?
faq.content: If the doctor determines that a physical examination is necessary, they will guide you on the next steps, which might include visiting a nearby clinic or hospital.

faq.title: How do I make payments?
faq.content: Payments can be made securely through various methods, including credit/debit cards, mobile wallets, or online banking. All transactions are encrypted to ensure your financial data is safe.

faq.title: What if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?
faq.content: You can cancel or reschedule your appointment through your account dashboard. Please note that cancellations made within a certain period before the consultation may be subject to a fee.

faq.title: What should I do if I miss my appointment?
faq.content: If you miss your scheduled appointment, you can either reschedule it or contact our support team for assistance. Depending on the terms, you might need to book a new consultation.

faq.title: Can I consult a doctor for my family members?
faq.content: Yes, you can book consultations on behalf of your family members. During the booking process, you can select the patient’s details for the consultation.

faq.title: What kind of health issues can I consult about online?
faq.content:
You can consult about a wide range of non-emergency health issues, including:
  • Common illnesses (cold, flu, infections)
  • Chronic conditions (diabetes, hypertension)
  • Mental health concerns
  • Dermatological issues
  • Sexual health and family planning

faq.title: What if I need urgent medical attention?
faq.content: Online consultations are not suitable for medical emergencies. If you require urgent medical care, please visit your nearest emergency room or contact local emergency services immediately.

faq.title: Are there any consultation limits?
faq.content: There are no strict limits on consultations, but it’s advisable to follow up with the same doctor if you have ongoing issues, as this allows for better continuity of care.

faq.title: How can I contact customer support?
faq.content: If you need help, our customer support team is available 24/7. You can reach us via email, phone, or live chat on our website.
